      • newPlace

        public void newPlace​(Measurements measurements,
                     java.lang.String miasto)
        Method that actualize data about statistics, weather parameters and add new measurement points to charts.
        Parameters:
        measurements - An object of Measurements storing information about current temperature and pressure value.
        miasto - A String representing the name of the city.

                             double value)
        Add new measurements point to the chart.
        Parameters:
        series - Series of the chart.
        value - A Double representing value of specific measurement.

      • setLabel1

        public void setLabel1​(java.lang.String temp,
                      java.lang.String pressure,
                      java.lang.String humidity,
                      java.lang.String min_temp,
                      java.lang.String max_tenp)
        Fills label with text about weather condition.
        Parameters:
        temp - A String representing temperature.
        pressure - A String representing atmospheric pressure.
        humidity - A String representing air humidity.
        min_temp - A String representing maximum temperature.
        max_tenp - A String representing minimum temperature.

      • setLabel2

        public void setLabel2​(int numberOfMeasurements,
                      double min_value,
                      double max_value,
                      double mean,
                      double odch_std)
        Fills label with text about statistics.
        Parameters:
        numberOfMeasurements - An Integer representing number of measurements.
        min_value - A Double representing minimal value of parameter when application is running.
        max_value - A Double representing maximal value of parameter when application is running.
        mean - A double representing mean from every measurements.
        odch_std - A double representing standard deviation of measurements.
